sentence.text: rRNA catabolic process encodes a catalytic subunit of the nuclear RNA exosome complex that mediates RNA processing and decay, and is mutated in several cancers.

In conclusion, we have identified a putative functional indel variant at chr13q22.1 that associates with decreased rRNA catabolic process expression in carriers of pancreatic cancer risk-increasing alleles, and could therefore affect nuclear RNA processing and/or decay
